instructions: Place a dinner fork on the bottom left with the prongs facing north.
Place a dinner knife to the right of the dinner fork, with the blade facing left.
Place a salad fork to the left of the dinner fork with the same orientation.
Place a salad knife to the right of the dinner knife, also with the blade facing left.
Place a soup spoon to the right of the salad knife, with the bowl facing up.
Place a dessert spoon near the top, in the middle of the fork and knives, make the bowl face left.
Move the dessert spoon to the right of the soup spoon, and make the bowl face up.
Move the dessert spoon towards the middle and near the top , and turn it so the bowl faces left.
Place a dinner plate in between the forks, the knives, and the dessert spoon.
Place a bread plate to the top left of the dinner plate, above the forks, and left of the dessert spoon.
Place a butter knife diagonally on the top left of the bread plate, the tip facing North-East.
Place a wine glass upright above the soup spoon, and slightly to the right.
Place a water glass above and to the left of the wine glass, and to the right of the dessert spoon.
Place a napkin on the dinner plate, oriented vertically in the middle of the plate.
